name: Primal Soup
description:
Make islands emerge from this primitive soup.

Game launches in fullscreen, press ALT+F4 to quit

Mouse controls only.
Left Clic / Right Clic and see what happens ...
Proof of concept state, all main mechanics are implemented.

Look up for screenshots for hints.

Hope you'll enjoy it!

[God Pot Gang] is Cloclo & Nico
